    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player(float xPos,
              float yPos,
              int width,
              int height,
              java.lang.String imgPath,
              float speed,
              int health,
              int attackDamage)
        Creates a player object (should only be done once)
        Parameters:
        xPos - x-coordinate of the sprite
        yPos - y-coordinate of the sprite
        width - width
        height - height
        imgPath - file path to the image representing the sprite
        speed - the speed of the character
        health - starting health of the character
        attackDamage - how much damage the character deals
